caption: Speculative decoding LLM achieves performance advantages with rapid drafting and parallel veriﬁcation, but suffers from three challenges.
Overall architecture of the proposed energy-efﬁcient speculative decoding LLM processor for billion-scale LLM applications with three key features.
Exponent Dual-Reuse MAC (EDRM) for saving MAC energy by reusing exponent processing of semantically identical, but positionally distinct tokens.
Draft Back-propagation Target Mixed-precision (DBTM) for reducing cost of the inefﬁcient weights and KV cache identiﬁed by gradients of draft model.
Draft Early-start Parallel Compute (DEPC) for improving hardware utilization by early start draft decoding in parallel with target veriﬁcation.
Measurement results of the SD LLM processor for billion-scale models and performance comparison with state-of-the-art LLM processors.
